column1: recommendations from (a) to (e) of the Cabinet Sub-Committee Report.

column2: (a)  To  retire  doctors  who  have  already  completed  the  age  of  63  years  before  31st
(b) To retire doctors who have completed the age of 62 years, upon attaining the age
(c) To retire doctors who have completed the age of 61 years, upon attaining the age
(d) To retire doctors who have completed the age of 60 years, upon attaining the age
(e) To retire doctors who have completed the age of 59 years, upon attaining the age
